page.title: 12SW BASINGSTOKE: INDUSTRY
page.content: Several companies use The Viables {Industrial Estate}on Brighton Hill and further development is under way. Motorola {produce} mobile radios, in particular for the armed forces. They also manufacture cellular radios. Digital took over the Optrex building to produce{ computer equipment}and ITT Cannon produce cookers. Access to the London area and the south coast is by means of the nearby M3 motorway. At nearby Hatch Warren farm you can pick-your-own fruit and vegetables such as strawberries,sweetcorn,peas, beans,onions and courgettes/marrows. One resident of Brighton Hill makes wooden models and sells them for Â£2 upwards. Viables Craft Centre allows local residents to buy{hand-made goods such as pottery, basketry, engravings, furniture, etched glassware and many more.
